import { useState } from 'react'; import { Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import Alert from '../components/alerts'; import { updatedevice } from '../actions/phone'; import { setAlert } from '../actions/alert'; const Update = ({ updated, phones, updatedevice, setAlert, failed, usertype }) => { const lis = []; const [namee, changename] = useState('Select Device'); const [valone, changevalone] = useState(''); const [formdata, setformdata] = useState({ _id: '', photo: '', name: '', network: '', launch: '', dimensions: '', sims: '', size: '', display: '', resolution: '', os: '', chipset: '', frontcamera: '', backcamera: '', video: '', storage: '', cpu: '', gpu: '', battery: '', colors: '' }); if (updated) { return ; } else if (failed) { return ; } const { _id, photo, name, network, launch, dimensions, sims, size, display, resolution, os, chipset, frontcamera, backcamera, video, storage, cpu, gpu, battery, colors } = formdata; phones.ress.forEach((pro) => { localStorage.getItem('id'); if (usertype === 'Admin') { if (pro.name.includes(valone) && valone !== "") { lis.push( { changename(pro.name); setformdata(pro); changevalone(''); }}>
{pro.name}
); } } else { if (pro.name.includes(valone) && valone !== "" && pro.user === localStorage.getItem('id')) { lis.push( { changename(pro.name); setformdata(pro); changevalone(''); }}>
{pro.name}
); } } }); const changeit = (e) => { setformdata({ ...formdata, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } const showit = (e) => { changevalone(e.target.value); } const justSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); document.body.scrollTop = 0; if (photo.length === 0 || name.length === 0 || network.length === 0 || launch.length === 0 || dimensions.length === 0 || sims.length === 0 || size.length === 0 || display.length === 0 || resolution.length === 0 || os.length === 0 || chipset.length === 0 || frontcamera.length === 0 || backcamera.length === 0 || video.length === 0 || storage.length === 0 || cpu.length === 0 || gpu.length === 0 || battery.length === 0 || colors.length === 0) { setAlert('Fill the Form Correctly', 'danger'); } else if (photo.length < 10) { setAlert('Invalid Photo URL', 'danger'); } else { updatedevice({ _id, photo, name, network, launch, dimensions, sims, size, display, resolution, os, chipset, frontcamera, backcamera, video, storage, cpu, gpu, battery, colors }); } } return (

Note : You can Update only those devices that you created

{namee} {lis}

); } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ phones: state.phone, updated: state.status.updateit, failed: state.status.failer, usertype: state.auth.user.usertype }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, { updatedevice, setAlert })(Update);
